# DotNetBuildSettings.SourceLinkToolVersion property

The version of the `sourcelink` tool to use when testing packages.

```csharp
public string SourceLinkToolVersion { get; set; }
```

## Remarks

Defaults to a stable version, which may change with new versions of Faithlife.Build, but will not change unless Faithlife.Build is updated.
